1.content:
Yukina's appearance: https://static.f-list.net/images/charima...

As the ball of dark orange light drowns below the horizon, the sky, once filled with a gradient of violet and blue, darkened into black and glittered with white specks of lights. Below the mystic heavens, a teenage girl was submerged in a hot, steaming body of clear water. Long black hair reached midway down her back with bangs framing her oval face. Gleaming violet eyes gazed at the crescent moon.

It was time to make her preparations for tonight’s mission.

Yukina stepped out of the hot spring, wrapping herself with a white towel to dry herself off. Her smooth, tender, light-tan skin was softened and cleansed by the hot purifying waters. Sliding the door open, she walked barefoot inside her home, and upon entering her room, she disrobed herself of the towel, hanging the wet fabric aside to be dried.

In a large square woven basket laid out her assassin attire, folded neatly in place. She started sliding her slender legs down the sleeves of a pair of black leathery shorts with a purple rim around the waist and two vertical zippers to tighten it around her thighs. A single black leather strip wrapped around her curvaceous breasts, zipped up at the center. One at a time, she slid her small bare feet down a pair of black leathery boots with front zippers that reached up to her upper thighs. She draped a black vest that reached down to her knees, left unzipped which revealed her midriff in the open. She wore black plated forearm and hand guards for protection. Her long silky black hair was tied into a bun with strands sticking upwards. A purple scarf wrapped around her neck. And finally, she concealed a pair of two short swords, hidden beneath her vest.

While it was common for assassins to wear light gear for the sake of mobility at the cost of durability, Yukina’s attired tended to leave her skin more exposed than the usual kunoichi. Different students cultivated different skills depending on their talents, and she cultivated her sense of touch to a supernatural level. She can feel the vibrations and currents in the air to sense disturbances. She can feel the ripples in the waters to sense creatures lurking about. She can read the vibrations against solids to sense nearby footsteps. Unfortunately, wearing clothes hindered all of that, having to sacrifice some protective gear in order to make use of her skill.

Traveling by foot, the youth spent hours lurking through the jungle at night, heading closer towards her destination which took form of a massive temple.

The kunoichi leered through the darkness of the night with the crescent lunar light being her main source of illumination. Her hypersensitivity felt the gentle movements of the air as she furtively ventured with silent steps in the massive ravine of rock formations on either side, towering the enormous ravine temple ruins that already dwarfed her small statue. The small waterfall was the main source of sound that her ears could pick up, a river of water streaming down gently toward greener pastures. Ancient manmade structures casted shadows with torn, eroding walls and pillars standing in certain parts and a large temple in the distance.

No guards, no traps, nothing proving to be an obstacle thus far. Her main challenge was locating her target, Lilith. However, as a precaution, she should explore the area in familiarize herself for her surroundings. Only by knowing more of her environment can she better formulate a plan and a backup plan in case something goes wrong. There was no urgent time limit besides the plentiful hours she has left before the sun rises back up again. She had all night, so she had no reason to rush haphazardly. Her client had informed her of an emergency exit that led to a secret entrance, something she better keep in mind in case she needed to retreat.

Where does she explore first?

1.title: Enter the Assassin!

11.content:
Stealthily entering the temple ruins, Yukina stumbled upon a massive open room filled with piles of glittering gold, jewelries, and artifacts.

In between a valley of riches, there was a luxurious wooden treasure chest.

Leaning against the base of one of the piles of gold, there was a tall, narrow mirror with an oriental black frame.

On the floor beyond, there was a glowing white magic circle with strange symbols written along the edges.

Did the young assassin bother to analyze her findings to quench her curiosity? Or, should she continue to explore deeper within the ruins?

111.content:
Yukina opened up the treasure chest, surprised to find not even a speck of dust inside. Before the disappointment could set in, a pair of ghost-like hands grabbed her waist, pulling her into the chest and submerging her in darkness.

“Ah! What the hell!” She yelled, trying to kick the chest back open, but the lid was closed and locked up. Curled up into a ball in a cramped space with her back pressed agianst the bottom and knees bent, the youth couldn't see anything as not a speck of light shined in.

Suddenly, more hands appeared, slowly beginning to caress her sensitive body, feeling almost pleasant. That was until one of them by her stomach gave it a quick tickle, getting some giggles out of the ticklish assassin. After the first one, more and more hands joined in, tickling her body as she bucked within the chest.

A couple of hands floated by her breasts before...
111.title: Treasure Chest

14.content:
Yukina decided to first explore the waterfall a bit more closely as she sensed something strange about it. She hoped this may lead to the emergency exit that her anonymous client had told her about, but since she cannot be sure, she kept her guard up. Leaping from one rocky platform to the next, she crossed the stream, avoiding the water altogether until she reached the jutted out land that led towards the waterfall’s flank. The kunoichi discovered a dark cave behind the waterfall. As her feet silently stepped on the uneven ground with smooth protruding stones, she kept her eyes closed, allowing her bare skin to feel the subtleties of the air and the ground. Faint tingling sensations allowed her to sense the movements around her like a kind of sonar.

Down the meandering the tunnel, the darkness slowly shifted to dim lighting as glowing blue crystals were found along the walls and ceilings. With eyes looking up, she felt her feet stepping on something made of metal. Casting her glance down, she found something round with hinges and a valve-handle. The vibrations of her step led her to sense something hollow underneath, like a pipeline down below. The size of the hatch suggested that it an opening big enough for her to slip below.

After taking a few steps past the hatch, she felt the flow of the air changing along with the vibrations on the ground. There were four separate tunnels forked before her, located west, east, north-west, and north-east respective to where she stood.

She felt a chill coming from the west tunnel.

She felt movements in the air coming from the north-west tunnel, indicating something moving.

She felt nothing out of the ordinary from the north-east tunnel.

She felt moist, humid air coming from the east tunnel.

Which path does she take?

choices: Nothing, keeping hanging there for dear life.
Take her chances and fall into the pit.
Draw her sword and fight while holding onto the handlebars.

Hook her legs around the handlebars to fight them upside down
142.content:
Having sensed something moving in the north-west tunnel through the vibrations around her, Yukina thought she'd take her chances to try and find someone to interrogate for more information. Silently striding down the tunnel second to her left with furtive steps, she eventually stumbled upon something bizarre.

Glowing blue crystals sparsely scattered along the walls, offering dim lighting. Her feet paused as she found the end of the road as the ground sharply drops down into a dark pit of unknown depths. The pit stretched across the entire width of the tunnel and perhaps thirty meters of distance away before the pathway continued on the other side. Despite her athleticism, she had no chance of jumping across thirty meters of distance.

But, that was where the strange part comes about. Along the ceiling over the long pit, there were a series of handlebars installed onto the rocky surface. It was essentially a larger, more omnious version of the monkey bars one may find at a playground. With her level of training, she was confident that she had the strength and stamina to make it across the entire thirty meter distance, but it was the deep pit below that frightened her along with the old, rusty-looking handlebars.

For whatever reason, she could longer sense the unnatural movements in the air which she felt earlier. Perhaps, they were deeper into the tunnel?

With a single jump, the brave kunoichi reached out her arms and gripped the first rusty metal bar on her end and slowly began to make her way across the chasm. Abdomen muscles tensed, the youth continued to place one arm after the other, making sure the next handlebar was stable enough before shifting her weight onto it completely. Yukina’s heart raced at the fear of falling. She didn’t dare to look down.

By the time she reached the halfway mark, she had fifteen more meters left to cross. However, that was when her skin began to tingle at the sudden movements in the air.

From the pit below, two white threads shot out and stuck themselves onto the ceiling, one in front of the girl and one behind the girl. Two creeping-crawling arachnids began to quickly climbs up their respective strand until they reached the ceiling where their legs clung onto the rocky surface to hold their own weight. Each of these monsters had the bottom of a meter-long black-bodied spider with eight long legs and the torso of a small human toddler with three pairs of red sinister eyes. The one in front of kunoichi had the face of a young boy, and the one behind the kunoichi had the face of a young girl.

Yukina was immediately creeped out by their hybrid appearances. She already hated spiders and insects to begin with due to their creepy, crawley sensation on the skin. Each spider-morph was about eight meters away from the girl who hung there at the center. Pincered on both ends, the girl couldn't simply monkey-bar her way forward or back without running into one of these two arachnids.

The two spider-morphs began crawling upside down along the ceiling, converging towards the human girl with mischievous grins. At their quick pace with those fast-moving legs, it would only take them about three seconds to reach her.

With only three seconds to make a decision, what will the kunoichi do in this disadvantageous situation?

1421.content:
Three... Two... One...

Yukina squeezed her eyes shut out of fright.

SPAT!

She felt something warm and sticky on her hands. As she tried to wiggle her fingers, she realized that she couldn't release her grip from the handlebar at all. Casting her eyes upward, she found two splotches of webbing engulfing her hands, gluing them onto the rusty, iron bar.

"Hey! Looks sis! It's a human girl!" said the male spider-morph who spun a web onto the ceiling and lowered himself such that he was hanging just a foot away from the girl with his face leveled with her breasts.

"Oh! I've never seen a human girl before!" said the female spider-morph who mirrored her brother by dangling right behind the helpless kunoichi.

"She looks so tender," the male spider-morph noted as he began to wiggle all eight of his spider arms to poke anywhere on the girl where there's bare skin.

"Ah!" Yukina squealed with a flinch as her body reflexively jolted and spasmed by each and every touch. "Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!" She giggled as the arms poked her in the armpits, ribs, sides, and bellybutton.

"Oh? She's so ticklish!" the female spider-morph joined in on the fun as she used her own set of eight spider legs to probe the girl's body, particularly the exposed parts.

"He-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!" the hyper-sensitive kunoichi burst out in laughter, her legs kicking wildly in the air. "No! Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! Stop! He-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!"

"She talks!" the tickling male spider-morph widened his eyes in surprise. "But, I don't think you want us to stop. Only an idiot would leave her stomach and armpits out in the open if she's THIS ticklish. So what are you? An idiot? Or do you simply dress like this so we can tickle you?"

"He-he-he-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! I'm an idiot! Ah-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! Please! He-ha-ha-ha-ha! Stop! Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!" She blurted out her response in the midst of her laughter. By no means did she dress like this to be tickled. Her sensory ability came at a price and functioned best without clothes covering her skin.

"Hmm..., I'm feeling generous today," said the male one who continued to poke her sensitive skin. If you want your freedom, you must pass a test." With his human hands, he unraveled the purple scarf from the girl's neck and wrapped around her eyes, tying it behind her head, letting it funciton as a blindfold. For that brief period of time, the tickling had stopped, letting the girl pant for air.

ZIP!

"!" Yukina tensed up as soon as she heard a short zipping sound followed by a cool breeze across her chest. A leathery fabric was placed into her mouth, "MMM!"

"Here, hold onto this with your mouth. Make sure you don't let go," said the male spider. "We're going to tickle you for one minute. If you drop the item of clothing in your mouth before one minute is up, we'll strip off another item of clothing and place it into your mouth. If you manage to hold onto it for the entire minute, we'll let you go. But, if you run out of clothes, you will be our tickle slave."

"MMMM!" Yukina shook her head, not liking the sound of this.

"Ready! Go!" The tickling trial commenced. A total of sixteen arms crawled all over her bare skin. A pair of human hands groped her breasts and toyed with her nipples.

The girl thrashed and squirmed violently, letting out a high-pitched muffled scream, "MMMMMM!"

Does Yukina pass the test?

Tucking her chin, she casted a glance at her petite, slender body, helplessly immbolized against an ‘X’ shaped wooden frame that was mounted against a stone wall. Towards the bottom, her arms were stretched beyond her head, wrists locked in similar iron cuffs. All of her clothes were gone, including her weapons. She was completely nude.

On the furtherest side of the room, she saw verical iron bars running along the cell. From the floow to the walls and ceiling, the surface of this room was made of tiles of rough grey stone. The four corners of the room held a torch that lit a flame the illuminate the scene in its warm, orange light.

Footsteps...

1421345.content:
A tall, curvaceous woman stepped into the dungeon cell that kept the naked assassin restrained. She had long black hair with sheep-like horns, pointed ears, dark-crimson bat wings, and a long devilish tail. She wore a crimson bra that revealed much of her large cleavages, matching underwear, dark-brown tights that reached to her upper thighs, and a pair of high heels.

Yukina recognized this woman as a succubus.

The succubus entered the room with a cart covered by a blanket, and after setting it not far from the girl, she turned towards her upside down captive with a confident smile.

"Well, well, well, what do we have here? A little assasin is after me". The succubus smiled.

Yukina widened her eyes. After her? So this was Lilith?

"You have been a bad girl my dear, and for that, you deserve to be punished. The spiders told be about how they captured you and I couldn't think of any better way to punish you then with these!" Suddenly, Lilith grabs the blanket covering the cart and reveals different sized feathers, brushes, oils, and many other tools.

Yukina looked at her in fear but remained silent. The tools on the cart were designed specifically to exploit her greatest weakness.

"Nothing to say?" asked Lilith."Dont worry! Soon you will be singing for me!"

"Now what should I use first...," the demonic woman gazed upon the cart, wondering what tools to use and what body part to play with first.

At this Yukina jerked her head up. If Lilith bent down to tickle her feet, she might be able to kick her unconscious. But her feet ... they were so unbearably ticklish, she didn't think she would be able to stand it. But she had to. This was her only shot.

info.description:
Yukina Chiyome:


Yukina was born and raised in an all-female group of kunoichi (female ninja) in service of the Takeda clan.

Appearance: https://static.f-list.net/images/charimage/16854417.png

Yukina has a young oval-shaped face with large violet eyes, a small nose, and a small mouth. She has long silky black hair with short strands framing her face, and her hair is often tied into a bun with strands sticking upwards. She has a small, slender framed body with smooth light-tan skin, standing at five foot and two inches with lithe arms and legs. She has medium-sized breasts, curvy hips, and a flat stomach.

Her attire is composed of a black strapless zip-front bra, a thin, flowy black vest that drapes down to her knees, a pair of shorts that covers only a few inches of her thighs, and a pair of black boots that zips up to her upper thighs at the front. She also wears a purple scarf around her neck, matching the purple outlines that borders the center of her vest, the upper rim of her shorts, and the outer edge of her boots. She wears black-plated armor on her forearms and the back of her hands for protection. Her vest is always seen unzipped, revealing her bare midriff in the open.

Power: Hypersensitivity - Yukina is much more physically sensitive than the average human. With her enhanced level touch, she can feel subtle vibrations in the air and the ground beneath her feet. In order to maximize her ability to sense her surroundings, she leaves her midriff and arms bare and exposed. However, her sensitivity is also her greatest downfall for she is also unbearably ticklish.

Rules:
Sexual content is allowed.
The protagonist isn't allowed to die.
